name: Maelstrom Madness - Fall 2018 - 470
description:
Cause the most mayhem and devastation, destroy the most buildings to earn the most points to win! Wipe out the surrounding area and collect power-ups to help you unlock the final building in the center and end the game.The final building is worth a huge amount of points, so even if you’re behind, try to claim the points for yourself.

Watch out for your opponents as well, knock your tornado into them to cause them to drop some of their points. Hit your tornado over the points to  steal them and take back the lead.
